title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 188 - Lettuce Grades And Definitions Of Culls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 188 - Lettuce Grades And Definitions Of Culls

State Regulations
§ 188.1 - Grades
§ 188.2 - Application of tolerances
§ 188.3 - Standard pack
§ 188.4 - Solidity classification
§ 188.5 - Definitions
§ 188.6 - Culls
§ 188.7 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 188

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§156-c, 156-d, 156-f

The following standards are practically identical with the
corresponding standards of lettuce grades heretofore promulgated by the

Secretary of Agriculture of the United States, commonly known as "U.S. Standards for Grades of Lettuce". [FN1] Packing of the product in conformity with the
requirements of these standards shall not excuse failure to comply with the
provisions of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, other Federal laws and
regulations, article 17 of the Agriculture and Markets Law and rules
promulgated pursuant thereto, or with applicable provisions of laws and
regulations of other states. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
